content: SUN Jun | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile SUN Jun Full-time Faculty Professor of Computer Science; Co-Director, Centre for Research for Intelligent Software Engineering; Lead Principal Investigator; Lee Kuan Yew Fellow School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research Statement Qualification PhD, National University of Singapore, 2006 Teaching Topics Software Engineering Programming Secure Software Engineering Program Analysis Formal Methods Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to LI Zhe WANG Haoyu ZHANG Ruihan ZHAO Wei Nay Myat Min WONG Wai Tuck +65 68261312 junsun@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceMachine Learning & IntelligenceInformation Systems & TechnologySoftware EngineeringCybersecuritySafety, Security & FairnessSecurity & Governance of Software/AI Systems Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
